mapper.sql: id, channel_type, cateId, sub_cate_id, name, summary, is_valid, online_time, offline_time, add_user_id, add_time, audit_user_id, audit_time, add_remark, audit_remark, invalid_remark, status, create_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from fm_goods
order by ${orderByClause}

select g.id,g.`name`,g.is_valid isValid, g.cateId,g.online_time onlineTime,g.offline_time offlineTime,g.sub_cate_id subCateId,g.channel_type channelType,g.summary,IFNULL(SUM(s.spu_total_count),0) spuTotalCount,IFNULL(SUM(s.spu_count),0) spuCount FROM fm_goods g left JOIN fm_spu_stock s ON g.id = s.goods_id where g.id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into fm_goods (id, channel_type, cateId, sub_cate_id, name, summary, is_valid, online_time, offline_time, add_user_id, add_time, audit_user_id, audit_time, add_remark, audit_remark, invalid_remark, status, create_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cateid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subCateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invalidRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into fm_goods
id,
channel_type,
cateId,
sub_cate_id,
name,
summary,
is_valid,
online_time,
offline_time,
add_user_id,
add_time,
audit_user_id,
audit_time,
add_remark,
audit_remark,
invalid_remark,
status,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update fm_goods
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
channel_type = #{record.channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cateId = #{record.cateid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sub_cate_id = #{record.subCateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
summary = #{record.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_valid = #{record.isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
online_time = #{record.onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
offline_time = #{record.offlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_user_id = #{record.addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_user_id = #{record.auditUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
audit_time = #{record.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_remark = #{record.addRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_remark = #{record.auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invalid_remark = #{record.invalidRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update fm_goods set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, channel_type = #{record.channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cateId = #{record.cateid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sub_cate_id = #{record.subCateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{record.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{record.isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, online_time = #{record.onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, offline_time = #{record.offlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_user_id = #{record.addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_user_id = #{record.auditUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, audit_time = #{record.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_remark = #{record.addRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_remark = #{record.auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invalid_remark = #{record.invalidRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update fm_goods
channel_type = #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cateId = #{cateid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sub_cate_id = #{subCateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

add_user_id = #{addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_remark = #{addRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fm_goods set channel_type = #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cateId = #{cateid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sub_cate_id = #{subCateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, online_time = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, offline_time = #{offlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_user_id = #{addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_user_id = #{auditUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_remark = #{addRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_remark = #{auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invalid_remark = #{invalidRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from fm_goods where id = #{key} or name = #{key} limit 1
